availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Married Eveline Norris. Father of Robert A. Norris, George F. Norris, John W. Norris, James F. Norris, and Henry V. Norris. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Unnamed District, p. 227; Find A Grave, "William Norris (1815 - 1891)," Memorial #50026353, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=50026353&ref=acom (accessed July 17, 2017).
